entry.title: Just food ?
entry.summary: Ria Retty doesnt just focus on food , She also has an interest for talent . "most young people lack moral support when it comes to talent and its up to a few people like me who can help know how and where to generate…
entry.content: Ria Retty doesnt just focus on food , She also has an interest for talent . "most young people lack moral support when it comes to talent and its up to a few people like me who can help know how and where to generate this positive energy " Ria says, she is a songwriter and a poet herself and most of her spokenword has hit the top bars like; slayqueen , wonder , utoi and many more .

entry.title: About
entry.summary: This site encourages people to live healthy . Empowering any person with basic knowledge on healthy food , it also mixes all arts and involves all kinds of people from allover the globe .
entry.content: This site encourages people to live healthy . Empowering any person with basic knowledge on healthy food , it also mixes all arts and involves all kinds of people from allover the globe .

entry.title: Spices and food
entry.summary: Some few years of good eat make you realise that health can sometimes be fun , yum and informative . Spices make a big part of food but what are they really ?
